channel.title: Conemu on Edwin Miguel, My Site
channel.description: Recent content in Conemu on Edwin Miguel, My Site

item.title: Tools
item.description: This entry coverages some tools I found useful during my work in software development (Windows and Linux), most of the open source Tool Description OS Free DBeaver as its site says, a Universsal Database tool WL y ConEmu excellent terminal emulator for Windows, something like “tmux” (not as sophisticated), and compatible wit many terminals (cmd, powershel, git-bash :), etc) W y KeePass tool to manage your passwords in secure way WL y Conventions OS (Operating System): Linux: L, Windows: W
